item.title: Life Is Killing Me
item.description: [[songs/m/massive_attack/heligoland/splitting_the_atom.md#the-baby-was-born-vyl-wnanory|Like a Jew in ancient Spain]] [[songs/m/massive_attack/heligoland/splitting_the_atom.md#the-baby-was-born-vyl-wnanory|And for Christ’s name]] [[songs/m/massive_attack/heligoland/splitting_the_atom.md#the-baby-was-born-vyl-wnanory|Did pay with pain]] [[songs/m/massive_attack/heligoland/splitting_the_atom.md#the-baby-was-born-vyl-wnanory|Modern day inquisition]] [[songs/t/tricky/blowback/excess.md#youve-gotta-ask-therell-be-a-new-tale-vyl-wnanory|What is the link between these crafts?

item.title: Nettie
item.description: [[songs/p/pierce_the_veil/selfish_machines/caraphernelia.md#sunshine-vyl-wnanory|Nettie,]] [[songs/p/pierce_the_veil/selfish_machines/caraphernelia.md#sunshine-vyl-wnanory|No need to cry]] [[songs/p/pierce_the_veil/selfish_machines/caraphernelia.md#sunshine-vyl-wnanory|Let me]] [[songs/p/pierce_the_veil/selfish_machines/caraphernelia.md#sunshine-vyl-wnanory|Wipe those tear drops from your eyes]] Nettie, No need to cry Let me Wipe those tear drops from your eyes [[songs/b/brand_new/the_devil_and_god_are_raging_inside_me/not_the_sun.
